name: Square Dodge
description:
Have fun in this minimalist game with a single goal: survive as long as you can! Just dodge the red squares!

This is a game where your awareness of red squares movement it's crucial! Focus is essencial to survive! 

Upgrades and Power-ups are available do increase the fun even more!

Power-Ups:
Invencibility - become invencible for a few seconds, allowing you to pass over red squares and find a safe location for the next few seconds!

Explosive - destroy red nearby red squares, reducing their numbers for a limited time!

Mini - red squares half size! Great to become easy to avoid them!

Slow - red squared half speed! Less speed? Great! It's easier to avoid slow squares!

And there are several upgrades! The more you play, it's more likely to achieve higher scores!

Cloud save and Shop comming soon!
